scripts.init: npm run clean && mkdir dist &&  cp package.json dist/package.json && npm run angular:watch & npm run electron:watch
scripts.package:mac: npm run clean && (cd angular && npm run build) && (cd electron && npm run package:mac)
scripts.package:win: npm run clean && (cd angular && npm run build && cd ..) && (cd electron && npm run package:win && cd ..)
